text: posting <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CFPRTEGTX/p1603287199126200?thread_ts=1603002617.107600&cid=CFPRTEGTX|this thread> here as this is a possible bug/flaw. The native divider module has a `width` attribute which conflicts when input as a `dnd_module` on a coded dnd template. Width is constrained to the 12 column hs dnd grid in that instance, but the divider width attribute can be 100.
